title: Lost At Sea
lyrics:
Need a break from heartbreak
Need a love that won't hate
Need a spark that won't burn
And a hand that won't hurt
I've been waiting and waiting and waiting

And nobody saved me, nobody saved me, no

I've been waiting and waiting and waiting

Until you came along



I was lost at sea

Calling helplessly

Then you rescued me

It's been a long time coming

Long time coming



When the waves got too high

And I looked to the sky

All alone with no one

All alone and broken



I was lost at sea

Calling helplessly

Then you rescued me

It's been a long time coming

Long time coming

I was on my knees

Heaven out of reach

Then you fell to me

It's been a long time coming

Long time coming



I've been waiting and waiting and waiting

And nobody saved me, nobody saved me, no

I've been waiting and waiting and waiting

Until you came along



I was lost at sea

Calling helplessly

Then you rescued me

It's been a long time coming

Long time coming



I was almost done

Thought the world had won

Then you found me love
